子宫内膜异位症与较高的心血管疾病风险有关研究人员探讨了子宫内膜异位症与心血管风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/endomegripis-linked-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-cardiovascular-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/Endomegripis-linked-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-cardieseasease-disease-risk-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A8B762B7-A9CE-47EC-A715-312DB6EE7BB3 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 03:20:00 -0500 Endometriosis linked to higher cardiovascular disease risk
研究揭示了体育活动对健康衰老的重要性体育锻炼可以延长老年人的寿命吗？发表在CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）上的评论文章https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj.231336总结了支持体育活动在预防或减少疾病影响方面的重要作用的大量证据并讨论如何为老年人开出有效的运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-reveals-the-importance-emportance-of-physical-achysical-activity-for for-Healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-reveals-the-importance-the-importance-of-physical-achysical-activity-for for-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5E04E60-2C78-40A8-9CEC-549CBD23412F Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:58:56 -0500 Study reveals the importance of physical activity for healthy aging
肿瘤扩散的早期检测改善了治疗结果Niigata University由神经外科研究所的神经外科研究所领导的小组成功地诊断了弥漫性中线神经胶质瘤中瘦脑疾病的诊断，方法是从这些患者手中从这些患者中循环的肿瘤DNA中检测出H3K27M-突变液滴。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/early-detection-of-tumor-spread-impread-improves-wareatment-utcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/early-detection-of-tumor-spread-impread-improves-wareatment-unatment-uncomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3e5d292-45ec-45ec-4b7b-930f-540c3bdbdab4 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:50:33 -0500 Early detection of tumor spread improves treatment outcomes
研究人员揭示了质地和品味在转移到行星饮食中的作用研究人员建议，了解肉质品味和质地背后的科学可能是更多人转向行星友好的植物饮食的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/researchers-reveal-the-the-the-the-------texture-and-taste-in--taste-in-shifting-to-to-to-a-planet-flanet-franet-franet-franet-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/researchers-reveal-the-the-the-the--texture--texture-and-taste-in-shifting-in-shifting-to-planet-planet-franet-franet-franet-franet-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AB828177-C5B1-4351-4351-8ACC-BDDA4E7630A4 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:37:26 -0500 Researchers reveal the role of texture and taste in shifting to a planet-friendly diet
罗斯程序为年轻患者提供持久的结果接受ROSS疾病手术的年轻患者表现出了出色的长期生存期，大多数人无需二十年后进行额外的手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/ross-procedure-offers-durable-results-in-young-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/ross-procedure-offers-durable-rasult-results-in-young-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B46D2873-5F86-4196-99AC-F455353DEC99 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:29:59 -0500 Ross procedure offers durable results in young patients
严重肺气肿患者的LVR可能胜过EBV随着当代手术实践的不断发展，患有外科肺量减少（LVR）的患者的高级肺气肿可能会比过去更长，并发症更少，并且甚至比选择内乘阀的患者可能更好（EBV） ）放置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/lvrs-may-ustperform-ebv-in-patients-with-severe-emphysema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/lvrs-may-ustperform-ebv-in-patients-with-severe-emphysema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A9F3AB78-6C51-48D9-A5BA-DBD2E9C91DB6 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 01:19:55 -0500 LVRS may outperform EBV in patients with severe emphysema
研究突出了治疗糖尿病心肌病的新方法宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。糖尿病心肌病（DCM）是一种独立于高血压和冠状动脉疾病的特定类型的心肌病，与糖尿病患者心力衰竭的高发病率和死亡率密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-highlights-novel-pableaches-to-warteating-dairating-dabicet--cartiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/study-highlights-novel-pableaches-to-warteating-dabiceting-dabicet-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3e9EA0C-3AAA-42D3-8879-4F138297600F Mon, 27 Jan 2025 00:01:57 -0500 Study highlights novel approaches to treating diabetic cardiomyopathy
一种多生物标志物方法，用于提高短暂性缺血攻击诊断的准确性宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。瞬态缺血性攻击（TIAS）的准确诊断是具有挑战性的。这项研究旨在分析血液生物标志物，以区分TIAS和模仿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/a-multi-biomarker-apphacker-apphacker-for-for-for-proving-the-accuracy-of-transient-transient-ischemic-schmictic-actact-actack-negnosic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/a-multi-biomarker-apphacker-apphacker-for-for-rproving-the-accuracy-of-transient-transient-ischemic- Ischemic-atctack-Attack-negnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=202A9101-2AB9-49D1-ACB6-ACB6-0AECFAB08182 Sun, 26 Jan 2025 23:55:29 -0500
机械主动脉瓣显示60岁及以下患者的长期生存率提高今天在2025年胸外科医师学会（STS）年度会议上发表的一项晚期研究表明，机械主动脉瓣置换术（AVR）为与生物假体瓣膜相比，为60岁及以下的患者提供了显着的长期生存益处。这项研究利用STS成人心脏手术数据库（ACSD）的数据提供了针对假体瓣膜结果迄今的最全面分析，其中包括超过100,000名患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/mechanical-aortic-valves-showed-showed-mpreped-long-term-term-survival-in-ter-in-patients-in-catients-in-patients-60 and-60 and-younger.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/mechanical-aortic-aortic-valves-showed-showed-mpred-long-term-term-survival-in-patients-in-patients-in-patients-60 and-60 and-younger.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf9c09fb-1E02-476E-B047-27D8726FDA5F Sun, 26 Jan 2025 23:48:36 -0500 Mechanical aortic valves showed improved long-term survival in patients aged 60 and younger
现实世界中的数据揭示了解剖学切除术对早期肺癌的生存益处在2025年胸外科医师学会（STS）年度会议上提出的新研究表明，与早期阶段非小细胞肺肺肺部患者相比癌症（NSCLC）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/real-world-data-reveals-survival-benefits-benefits-of-anatomic-enatomic-entections-fort-cancerly阶段 - 阶段 - 伦格 - cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250126/real-world-data-reveals-survival-benefits-benefits-of-anatomic-enatomic-enatomic-enatomic-enatomic-enatomic-for-cancerly阶段式伦格 - cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fee091EF-1700-42EE-9182-46E8FC4C5A9D Sun, 26 Jan 2025 23:42:00 -0500 Real-world data reveals survival benefits of anatomic resections for early-stage lung cancer
